TopicTitle: You know you play too much KSP when...

Articles.Content:
I'll start:

...you want to jettison your legs after climbing up stairs, because you reached high enough altitude and they would be dead weight anyway.
im pretty sure this thread already exists.

I'll start:

...you want to jettison your legs after climbing up stairs, because you reached high enough altitude and they would be dead weight anyway.

There's a thread for that.

when you scroll back to the start of this page to make a joke

and when you restart a decade old post
